welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Zeitz, a charming city known for its beautiful architecture and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Zeitz has to offer during your visit!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal building at Halle Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wilmington Railway Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Wilmington Railway Airport provides easy access for international travelers and offers customs and immigration services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
